preamble: A N  A Ct   To   Amend   The  D Angerous  A Nimals  O Rdinance (C Hapter  49 )
Be It  Enacted By The Parliament Of The Democratic Socialist Republic Of Sri Lanka As Follows:

child_level_list.text: This Act may be cited as the Dangerous Animals (Amendment) Act, No. 40 of 2022.

Section 7 of the Dangerous Animals Ordinance (Chapter 49) (hereinafter referred to as the principal enactment) is hereby amended in paragraph ( a ) of subsection (4) of that section by the substitution for the words one thousand rupees, of the words two hundred and fifty thousand rupees.
Section 8 of the principal enactment is hereby amended  by the substitution for the words the court will proceed to take measures for carrying such order into execution., of the following:
pre_block_list: Amendment of section 8 of the principal enactment
the court will proceed to take measures for carrying such order into execution:

Provided however, the destruction of the animal shall only be carried out in a humane manner with no pain or suffering caused to the animal by a registered veterinary surgeon or registered veterinary practitioner or any other person referred to in paragraph ( b ) of subsection (2) of section 32 of the Veterinary Surgeons and Practitioners Act, No. 46 of 1956

child_level_list.text: In the event of any inconsistency between the Sinhala and Tamil texts of this Act, the Sinhala text shall prevail.
pre_block_list: Sinhala text to prevail in case of inconsistency
